plot: After accidentally killing a rival (El Indio) on the ring, Rodrigo "Black Mask" Martinez wrestles with his inner demons, and tries to beat the champ, Mil Mascaras, in a final fight.
title: Una rosa sobre el ring
plot_es: After accidentally killing a rival (El Indio) on the ring, Rodrigo "Black Mask" Martinez wrestles with his inner demons, and tries to beat the champ, Mil Mascaras, in a final fight.
plot_en: After accidentally killing a rival (El Indio) on the ring, Rodrigo "Black Mask" Martinez wrestles with his inner demons, and tries to beat the champ, Mil Mascaras, in a final fight.
